AzureAd.Domain: Get from Entra ID > Primary Domain. Typically something.onmicrosoft.com
AzureAd.TenantId: Get from Entra ID App Registration > Overview > Directory (tenant) ID
AzureAd.ClientId: Get from Entra ID App Registration > Overview > Application (client) ID
AzureAd.ClientSecret: Sensitive value. Do not accidentally commit to source control. Get from Entra ID App Registration > Certificates & Secrets > <your client secret> > Value
